version_description: Bug fixes and improvements.

Buckle up survivors, we have a new update that packs quite the punch!

*NEW FEATURES*

* Summoning (Heroes, Weapons, Trinkets)
* Trinkets: A brand-new equipment type to collect and customize your heroes
* Login Rewards: Dedicated survivors will earn bonuses each day
* Events: Unique set of road trips with special rewards including rare weapons and an EPIC Hero: Tallahassee
* Store: Stock up on your favorite yellow, spongy treats.
*Game Speed: We've kicked the cardio up a notch and increased the game's speed

This update also includes additional gameplay improvements and bugs that have been double tapped!

Buckle up survivors, we have a new update that packs quite the punch!

*NEW FEATURES*

* Summoning (Heroes, Weapons, Trinkets)
* Trinkets: A brand-new equipment type to collect and customize your heroes
* Login Rewards: Dedicated survivors will earn bonuses each day
* Events: Unique set of road trips with special rewards including rare weapons and an EPIC Hero: Tallahassee
* Store: Stock up on your favorite yellow, spongy treats.
*Game Speed: We've kicked the cardio up a notch and increased the game's speed

This update also includes additional gameplay improvements and bugs that have been double tapped!

Hello Survivors! We have a ton of exciting new features in this update:

1. Four New Heroes: Slay some zombie butt with Berkeley, Vegas, Flushing, Medford
2. Zombie Pigeons: Shoot to earn rewards! The only thing they’ll be feeding on is lead!
3. Added Daily and Weekly Quests for more sweet loot!
4. Additional Epic Heroes to unlock!
5. Featured Summons: Prioritize the Heroes & Equipment you want!
6. The Market is now open! Grab a free daily reward and deals on limited supply items!
7. Weapons Systems Update – Kill more zombies in less time!

We've also checked the backseat, found some bugs, and tossed 'em out the window!

Hello Survivors! We have a ton of exciting new features in this update:

1. Four New Heroes: Slay some zombie butt with Berkeley, Vegas, Flushing, Medford
2. Zombie Pigeons: Shoot to earn rewards! The only thing they’ll be feeding on is lead!
3. Added Daily and Weekly Quests for more sweet loot!
4. Additional Epic Heroes to unlock!
5. Featured Summons: Prioritize the Heroes & Equipment you want!
6. The Market is now open! Grab a free daily reward and deals on limited supply items!
7. Weapons Systems Update – Kill more zombies in less time!

We've also checked the backseat, found some bugs, and tossed 'em out the window!

Hello Survivors! We have a ton of exciting new features in this update:

1. Four New Heroes: Slay some zombie butt with Berkeley, Vegas, Flushing, Medford
2. Zombie Pigeons: Shoot to earn rewards! The only thing they’ll be feeding on is lead!
3. Added Daily and Weekly Quests for more sweet loot!
4. Additional Epic Heroes to unlock!
5. Featured Summons: Prioritize the Heroes & Equipment you want!
6. The Market is now open! Grab a free daily reward and deals on limited supply items!
7. Weapons Systems Update – Kill more zombies in less time!

We've also checked the backseat, found some bugs, and tossed 'em out the window!

Incoming, Survivors! The newest update is here to help keep you stocked, locked and loaded:

New features
1. Expeditions: Send your heroes to search for valuable resources!
2. Mail System: Receive important updates and notifications in the game.
3. More Epic Trinkets: A butt-ton of new Epic Combat and Special Trinkets!
4. Auto-Equip! And of course, Quick Unequip.

Improvements:
1. New Cloud Save functionality!
2. Skill Tree improvements and bug fixing.
3. Improved offline progression.
4. Many more UI improvements, retuned elements, and bugs squashed!
It's time to nut up or shut up! Zombieland: Double Tapper is now available worldwide! Download and start your post-apocalyptic adventure today!
Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements

Various improvements, including fixes for...
- Localization and text display
- Bugs affecting Atlanta's and Madison's skills

Are you ready for an unforgettable road trip!?

- New Heroes: Bowman and Barry Bear!
- Monthly Quests: More reward-granting achievements!
- Dog Tags: New currency to exchange for more rewards!
- Festive holiday events coming your way!

This update also includes various fixes and improvements

This version includes...
- Festive holiday events coming your way!
- Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements

Get ready to stuff your stockings full of lead, survivors!

- Introducing our new competitive mode: KILL OF THE WEEK! Compete against players worldwide to prove you’re the best zombie slayer. Earn increasingly awesome rewards for fighting in harder Leagues.
- New Heroes: meet Santa Tallahassee and Richmond!
- 12 Days of holiday-themed road trips
- Jolly Zombie Costumes: Even the dead can get in the holiday spirit
- Stay tuned for more festive events coming you way!

Get ready to stuff your stockings full of lead, survivors!

- Introducing our new competitive mode: KILL OF THE WEEK! Compete against players worldwide to prove you’re the best zombie slayer. Earn increasingly awesome rewards for fighting in harder Leagues.
- New Heroes: meet Santa Tallahassee and Richmond!
- 12 Days of holiday-themed road trips
- Jolly Zombie Costumes: Even the dead can get in the holiday spirit
Various bug fixes and improvements.

This version includes...
- A new hero: meet Indiana!
- Various bug fixes and improvements

This version includes...

- Fixed issues affecting summons for heroes at 7 stars
- Improvements to Premium Pass purchase experience
- Removed offline indicator from hero collection screen to prevent lag

Introducing our new event: THE TOWER OF BABYLON! Fight your way up a zombie infested skyscraper filled with exclusive characters and rewards waiting to be cleared out and looted!

NEW HEROES
-King Tallahassee: A zombie slaying showman unlike any other! Hail to the king, baby.
-Sister Cynthia Knickerbocker: As a former Zombie Kill of the Week champion, she’ll be DROPPING holy levels of hell on zombie hordes

VALENTINES DAY EVENTS
-New quests and Chocolate Hearts to trade at the Valentines Market

Introducing our new event: THE TOWER OF BABYLON! Fight your way up a zombie infested skyscraper filled with exclusive characters and rewards waiting to be cleared out and looted!

NEW HEROES
-King Tallahassee: A zombie slaying showman unlike any other! Hail to the king, baby.
-Sister Cynthia Knickerbocker: As a former Zombie Kill of the Week champion, she’ll be DROPPING holy levels of hell on zombie hordes

VALENTINES DAY EVENTS
-New quests and Chocolate Hearts to trade at the Valentines Market

OTHERS
-Bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements

Ready for a month of March full of events, survivors?

CELEBRATE FEMALE POWER:
- Female Heroes are (as always!) ready to kick ass in the Kill of the Week -now they will score extra points!
- Get all the badass women with the new Female Hero Recruitment Event!

SAINT PATRICK'S DAY:
- Complete the Luck of the Irish quests and get nifty lucky equipment!
- Enjoy a set of 7 Seasonal Missions

Our St. Patrick and Baseball Season events needed some meaty rewards... Ready for a special airdrop, survivors?

NEW HEROES AVAILABLE:
- Florence, a rare Support heroine as cheerful as can be!
- Louiseville, an epic DPS hero who is all about the 'Hit', and not so much about the 'Run'...
- Laguna, an epic Tank wrestler exclusive to Kill of the Week!
Bug fixes and improvements
Rule #35 Survive the wave... and live to play another day!

Rule #35 Survive the wave... and live to play another day!

This new version includes FRESH CONTENT to not get bored at home…

Use the MOST WANTED trinkets of all times included in this new version: toilet paper, sanitiser and protection masks against the zombies

Rule #35 Survive the wave... and live to play another day!

This new version includes FRESH CONTENT to not get bored at home…
Use the MOST WANTED trinkets of all times included in this new version: toilet paper, sanitiser and protection masks against the zombies
Rule #35 Survive the wave... and live to play another day!

Hey there Survivors - We have rolled out the newest update for you to enjoy!

-4 new heroes! Unlock El Paso, Alexandria, Cheyenne and Colorado
-Squads are here! – All new ways to build teams with your roster of heroes for more zombie killing fun!
-Improvements! We've listened to your feedback and now you can summon more heroes with sim cards
-We’ve also added more places to get shards of your favorite heroes in various activities across the game. Check out your Summons, Missions and Events for more rewards
-Epic and Rare Heroes will now unlock at a more powerful level: 3 Stars for Epics and 2 Stars for Rares. From now on, adding them to your roster will allow you to throw them into the action much quicker than before.
Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements

4 NEW HEROES:
Newport, Waikiki, Menlo and Edison!

NEW MECHANIC:
Hero Pairs. Menlo the crazy scientist and Edison, his robot, will make each-other a LOT stronger if assigned to the same team.

NEW GAMEPLAY MECHANICS:
Electric zapping and Menlo's electric fence.

OTHER CHANGES:
The Team Selection screen has a major facelift.
The seasonal markets now have timers displayed.
Various bug fixes and improvements

2 NEW HEROES:
Regina and Montana

FEATURES:
Skill trees are now permanent and no longer reset at mission completion or cash in.
The Zeppelin can now be charged up to 12 hours.
Bosses now require several hits to die, similar to the Football zombie.
The Story Mission screen has been reworked to show the offline progression status.

EXTRA:
Stay tuned for an awesome 4th of July Celebration, with Special Missions, Events and Exclusive Equipment in the Shop
Various bug fixes and improvements

NEW HEROES:
Space Force officer Roswell and his mysterious partner 51 who is definitely not an alien
Put them on the same team to unlock new abilities
NEW EVENT:
New multi week Gauntlet event featuring all new heroes, weapons, and items.
NEW FEATURE:
Push Notifications – receive an alert when your team completes a mission, or have stopped progressing and need to be leveled up
Various bug fixes and improvements

NEW HEROES:
TAMPA - the “Ape Queen”, founder of Gorilla Junction, Florida’s finest simian rescue sanctuary and zoo.
KINSHASA - the gorilla. That’s right, an actual gorilla. *ook*
BURBANK – Low-life paparazzi who is on the hunt for an A-list celebrity zombie photo.
BRUNSWICK – Bowler extraordinaire who is always working on the perfect game – of zombie killing
NEW EVENT:
New multi week Gauntlet event featuring all new heroes, weapons, and items.
NEW FEATURE:
Favorite Weapon - When equipping a weapon, each hero’s favorites are now marked in the equip screen.

Game Improvements:
Push Notifications – Now you can be alerted when your team finishes a mission, runs into trouble, and your 2x speed boost runs out. Go to “Notifications” in the settings menu in the game to activate, and make sure push notifications for Zombieland are set to on in your device settings.
Favorite Weapon - When equipping a weapon, each hero’s favorites are now marked in the equip screen.
Super abilities are now more effective against the riot shield zombie. That guy is a jerk.
Heroes should be better at smashing zombies with their melee weapons.

NEW HEROES
Avast, me hearties! Pirates ahoy just in time for Talk Like a Pirate Day!
Tortuga - Scourge of the high seas themed restaurants
New Orleans - The pirate lass who’ll kick your, well, you know
Non-Pirates ahoy!
Newark – Construction worker that loves heavy machinery, heavy metal, and heavy melee weapons
Bensonhurst – “Legitimate businessman” who used to break legs for the mob, now just breaks ’em for fun.
New Event:
New multi week Gauntlet event featuring all new heroes, weapons, and trinkets
NEW FEATURE
Squad Sorting – You can now sort your heroes by squad to make it easier to build the team you want
Various bug fixes and improvements

NEW HEROES:
ZOMBIEMAN and BRAIN BOY - Masked vigilantes who fight crime! “Crime” being “Zombies” and “Fight” being “Shoot”
SALEM – Mistress of the night, scourge of the light, and a blast at parties
TOMBSTONE – Mysterious stranger with a spooooky secret!
NEW EVENTS:
IT’S OUR BIRTHDAY!
Can you believe it!? It’s been a year! We invite you to join us in our One Year Anniversary party! There will be celebratory events and exclusive items. And CAKE!
HALLOWEEN!!
You didn’t think we’d forget HALLOWEEN did you? Play the all new Tower of Doom to win holiday tricks and treats! Don’t worry, it’s mostly treats!
FEATURE UPDATE:
RULES REVAMP!!!
We are rolling out a big improvement to the Rules system. You will now have more control over which rules you unlock and upgrade! Customize your boosts to better fit your gameplay style.
Various bug fixes and improvements

HALLOWEEN!
It’s time to trick or treat (and shoot)!
New Hero: Tombstone – Mysterious stranger with a wicked blade!
The Tower of Doom is here – Earn Crystal Skulls to get all new items in the Halloween market.
Introducing the Zombie Spinner – Play for Halloween prizes and Crystal Skulls.
FEATURE UPDATES
The equipment limit increased from 250 to 500.
More control over hero and item summons: use sims and keys or use Twinkies.
Squad filter added to mission select screens.
Various bug fixes and improvements

The equipment limit increased from 250 to 500.
More control over hero and item summons: use sims and keys or use Twinkies.
Squad filter added to mission select screens.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

NEW HEROES:
DETROIT and CLEVELAND – Singer and bassist for Blind Panther, they rock so hard even the undead stop and bang their heads.
FRANKLIN – This postwoman always delivers. She can park her mail truck anywhere, even on top of zombies.
PILGRIM TALLAHASSEE and TOM TURKEY – Happy Thanksgiving! Get stuffed with these holiday turkeys.
NEW FEATURE:
Shard Exchange: Convert shards of maxed out heroes into currency for the Exchange Market.
COMING SOON:
Thanksgiving Market with all new weapons and items

FEATURE UPDATES:
Better hero sorting for mission selection screens – See all heroes who qualify for a mission as well as those that don’t yet meet the requirements
Piercing effect improved – Bullets with piercing effect cut though zombies like a hot knife through butter now
Supply Run rewards screen improved – see how your bonus materials are earned
Perks added to common trinkets
COMING SOON:
Thanksgiving celebration with all new weapons and items!

Piercing effect improved – Bullets with piercing effect cut though zombies like a hot knife through butter now

Perks added to common trinkets

Thanksgiving celebration with all new weapons and items!

Thanksgiving celebration with all new weapons and items!
Various bug fixes and improvements.

We’ve improved the hero, weapon, and trinket menus to make it easier to build and equip your ideal teams.

FEATURES
Total team power now displayed on hero screen
New inventory filters - Sort/filter by multiple criteria at once
Weapon and Trinket menus – Added filter by item effect
Improved scrapping interface – includes number of items selected
“Handgun” type is now “Pistol” to better distinguish from “Dual handgun” type
Nutting up heroes during missions is faster when holding upgrade button.

It's time to turn on the holiday decorations and present the NEW HO HO HEROES!
NEW HEROES:
SANTA CLAUS - Yes, Santa is real. A real bad-ass and Zombies are all on the naughty list
NORTH POLE - Enterprising elf who turned Santa’s Workshop into a zombie killing weapons factory.
MRS. CLAUS - Super supportive Mrs. who buffs the whole Christmas squad.
Winter festival:
Earn snowflakes to get unique limited time weapons and trinkets in the Winter Festival Store.

It's time to turn on the holiday decorations and present the NEW HO HO HEROES!
NEW HEROES:
SANTA CLAUS - Yes, Santa is real. A real bad-ass and Zombies are all on the naughty list
NORTH POLE - Enterprising elf who turned Santa’s Workshop into a zombie killing weapons factory.
MRS. CLAUS - Super supportive Mrs. who buffs the whole Christmas squad.
Winter festival:
Earn snowflakes to get unique limited time weapons and trinkets in the Winter Festival Store.

The holidays are here with all new limited time weapons, trinkets, and heroes
New events:
- Explore the Tower of Frost for unique rewards
- Find Santa’s hat! (or keep it for yourself)
- Collect presents to spend in the Christmas market
New Heroes
- SANTA TALLAHASSEE - He is coming to town with plenty of buffs for teammates and lumps of coal for zombies.
- FAIRBANKS – Cold weather sniper deadly at twenty clicks and twenty below

NEW HEROES:
YUKON and CORNELIUS. An Arctic Explorer with a desire for fame and fortune and his meal ticket, Cornelius The Yeti. Cornelius doesn't know what fame and fortune are, but Yukon said there'd be chicks.
FARGO. Cold weather cop with a warm heart and hot lead. Crackerjack with a pistol, don'tcha know.
NANTUCKET. Salty seafarer with a hefty harpoon. Often three sheets to the wind. Sometimes four.

NEW HEROES:
YUKON and CORNELIUS. An Arctic Explorer with a desire for fame and fortune and his meal ticket, Cornelius The Yeti. Cornelius doesn't know what fame and fortune are, but Yukon said there'd be chicks.
FARGO. Cold weather cop with a warm heart and hot lead. Crackerjack with a pistol, don'tcha know.
NANTUCKET. Salty seafarer with a hefty harpoon. Often three sheets to the wind. Sometimes four.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

NEW FEATURES:
HARD MODE:
Harder missions for superior rewards. It's not going to be easy!
SQUAD SUMMON:
New reward type that lets you focus on the squad you want to grow. Only rare and epic hero drops!
NEW HEROES:
Celebrate Valentine's Day with CUPID TALLAHASSEE
Get medieval on zombies with King BUCKINGHAM, Knight KENSINGTON, and Princess WINDSOR.

Happy St. Patrick’s Day!
LEPRECHAUN COLUMBUS is here to drive the zombies from Zombieland.
It’s a Jail break!
Play the PRISON TOWER event and earn all new Lawbreaker Squad survivors:
FOLSOM - Bank robber that can even make the dead reach for the sky
SAN QUENTIN - Safe cracker who can blow through any vault – and usually hordes of zombies
JOLIET - Toughest con in cell block Z. Never misses arm day.

NEW HEROES:
LAGUARDIA - Airline pilot who can lighten the load right on top of zombies
KENNEDY - Flight attendant who redefines "Arm doors for takeoff"
O'HARE - Ground controller who can land planes on the head of a pin. Or a zombie.
SAVANNAH - Kid Kamper earning her zombie killing badge
New Events:
Play FLY WITH ME and EARTH DAY CELEBRATION for new limited time items and weapons
IMPROVED STORE – Now with more character offers and easier navigation

NEW HEROES
KUNLUN - Buddhist monk who can make zombies one with the universe. Sorta.
HIDALGO - Lucha Libre técnico that destroys zombi rudos from the top rope.
INDIANAPOLIS - Race car driver that won’t let a horde of zombies slow him down.
DAYTONA - Pit crew chief that can refit the whole squad in a flash & get’em back in the race.
New Events:
Earn exclusive rewards in the CINCO DE MAYO and HOT WHEELS events.

NEW HEROES
KUNLUN - Buddhist monk who can make zombies one with the universe. Sorta.
HIDALGO - Lucha Libre técnico that destroys zombi rudos from the top rope.
INDIANAPOLIS - Race car driver that won’t let a horde of zombies slow him down.
DAYTONA - Pit crew chief that can refit the whole squad in a flash & get’em back in the race.
New Events:
Earn exclusive rewards in the CINCO DE MAYO and HOT WHEELS events.

NEW HEROES
MALIBU - Lifeguard who’ll kick sand in a zombie’s face, then club them with safety equipment (safe for her, anyway).
VENTURA - Beach boy that loves to party. And shotguns. And shotgun parties. Doesn’t seem safe, honestly.
MIAMI - Beach bunny who can skate circles around zombies, filling them full of lead in the process.
BERMUDA - Deep sea diver that can unleash the kraken on zombies. Zombies hate krakens.
New Events:
Earn exclusive rewards in the DAY AT THE BEACH and DEEP SEA events.

NEW HEROES
BRIDGEPORT - Circus Ringleader who cracks a zombie's head clean off with his whip.
SARASOTA - Clown who can juggle a horde of zombies and an SMG at the same time.
CONEY ISLAND - Strongman who will knock a zombie clear across the map with his massive guns. Not bad with a shotgun either.
HARVARD - Judge who brings order to the zombie hordes with his gavel. Not afraid to use dual pistols on those in contempt.
NEW EVENTS
Earn exclusive rewards in the CIRCUS IN TOWN and LAW AND ORDER events.

GUILDS AND RAIDS ARE HERE!
Band together with other players to form guilds hunt zombies in the new and challenging Raids.
Coordinate with your guild to complete 4 difficulty levels for EXCLUSIVE REWARDS.
POWERFUL NEW RULES
40 NEW RULES with unique Effects. Collect Silver and Gold nuggets to upgrade rules and increase your power.
NEW RAID HERO
ARLINGTON - Hero in a super soldier suit who gains power and progress speed in raids.
